explains: adj. （疾病）恶化的，变性的；退化的，变坏的
wordGroup: degenerative disease n. 变性疾病

sentences.en: Mice infected with a herpesvirus generally develop keratitis, a degenerative disease affecting part of the eye.
sentences.cn: 感染疱疹病毒的老鼠一般会患上角膜炎，这是一种影响部分眼睛的变性疾病。

sentences.en: A recent study suggests that vitamin E supplements, despite widespread belief in their efficacy, are no better than sugar pills for delaying the onset of the degenerative disease.
sentences.cn: 最近的一项研究表明，尽管人们普遍相信维生素 E 补充剂的功效，但在延缓退行性疾病发病方面，维生素 E 补充剂并不比糖丸效果更好。

sentences.en: Due to degenerative changes cells were showing cytoplasmic vacuolation and cytoplasmic and nuclear blebbing.
sentences.cn: 由于退行性病变，细胞显示出细胞质的空泡化和细胞质和细胞核气泡现象。
